oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Stella Mortem to Honorable William G. Brownlow
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A threatening letter from "Stella Mortem", Magi in Chief and Great Grand Cyclops, Ku Klux Klan to Governor William G. Brownlow. "Stella Mortem" is likely a fictional character to hide the author's true identity.
"Stella Mortem" is Latin for "death star." The Ku Klux Klan was organized in Pulaski in 1866.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: "Stella Mortem," Magi in Chief and and Great Grand Cyclops of the Ku Klux Klan
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ku Klux Klan (19th cent.); Reconstruction (U.S. history, 1865-1877)
